original: 徐州彭城人。師從東漢末年名醫華陀，善於針灸，得華陀傳授「漆葉青黏散」，服之有益於人，樊阿從其言，壽百餘歲。
text: People from Pengcheng, Xuzhou. Under the tutelage of the famous doctor Hua Tuo in the late Eastern Han Dynasty, he was good at acupuncture and moxibustion. After Hua Tuo taught 'Qingye Qingjian San', taking it to benefit people, Fan A from his words, lived more than a hundred years old.
